text: The Landmark Conference Men's Basketball Tournament is the annual conference basketball championship tournament for the NCAA Division III Landmark Conference. The tournament has been held annually since 2008. It is a single- elimination tournament and seeding is based on regular season records. The winner, declared conference champion, receives the Landmark's automatic bid to the NCAA Men's Division III Basketball Championship. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Champions !Score !Runner-Up |- align=center | 2008 | Scranton | 64–57 | Juniata |- align=center | 2009 | Scranton | 80–75 (OT) | Susquehanna |- align=center | 2010 | Merchant Marine | 68–54 | Scranton |- align=center | 2011 | Scranton |82–71 | Catholic |- align=center | 2012 | Scranton | 78–70 | Juniata |- align=center | 2013 | Catholic | 63–62 | Juniata |- align=center | 2014 | Scranton | 71–56 | Susquehanna |- align=center | 2015 | Scranton | 76–65 | Catholic |- align=center | 2016 | Catholic | 83–80 | Susquehanna |- align=center | 2017 | Scranton | 68–63 | Moravian |- align=center | 2018 | Moravian | 81–78 | Juniata |- align=center | 2019 | Moravian | 86–72 | Drew |- align=center | 2020 | Susquehanna | 86–69 | Scranton |} ==Championship records== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- !
